name: Kyoro-chan no Purikura Daisakusen
storyline:
Kyoro-chan loves Purikura. Today, Kyoro-chan is looking for Purikura in order to fill his notebook with them.
But the Mame Army is in Kyoro-chan's way!
Kyoro-chan collects Purikura as she defeats the Mame Army with poking attacks and jump kicks.
Kyoro-chan will be in a jungle, an amusement park, a funny land, and even under the sea...
Can Kyoro-chan complete his Purikura Notebook?
summary: Kyoro-chan no Purikura Daisakusen is an Action game in which the player controls the parrot in different levels. During those levels he will face different animal enemies: Like monkeys and other bizarre creatures. The player got different attack movement and even some special attacks when he finds different kind of balloons.
